ing: 1 (5 ounce) can tuna in water, drained
des: "Sweet apples and sauerkraut combined to make a uniquely flavored tuna sandwich.  A low calorie, highly filling snack or meal. You may choose to top the tuna mixture with any of your favorite vegetables."
ins: Mix tuna, sauerkraut, apple, Dijon mustard, and red wine vinegar in a bowl. Serve on toasted wheat bread.
